A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It craps on everything that came before it. Even the movie that this is a sequel to. They cared more about getting their political agenda across than telling a good story\, and can someone tell me why Rian Johnson has a hard on for not fulfilling on set ups? Everything that is set up in the force awakens and even in this movie is just never brought to justice. The have star is for shirtless Kylo Ren\, I know the scene was useless and dumb but my boy is a straight beef cake.
